title: Full overwrite AppV1 with provided “Nexus Singularity” (Landing + Pro Cockpit + Client Explorer), frontend-only

requirements.text: Fully overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact “Nexus Singularity (Landing Page + SaaS)” code provided by the user (verbatim replacement of the entire file). Do not add features or refactor the provided UI/logic; only apply the minimum mechanical edits required for this repository to compile/run (e.g., missing imports, unresolved identifiers, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` contents are fully replaced by the user-provided code (no partial merges).
The app builds successfully with Vite/TypeScript tooling used by this repo.
The runtime behavior matches the provided code: Landing → Client Explorer and Landing → Pro Onboarding → Pro Cockpit flows render and are navigable as coded.
Persistence uses the same localStorage key as in the provided code: `nexus_v12_clean`.

requirements.text: Preserve the existing application entry wiring: do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx` (must remain a thin wrapper rendering `AppV1`) and do not modify any frontend immutable entry files. The app must continue to mount via the existing `frontend/src/main.tsx` wiring.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` remains a thin wrapper that renders `AppV1`.
No changes are made to any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
The application still mounts through `frontend/src/main.tsx` as currently wired.

requirements.text: Keep the implementation frontend-only for now: remove/avoid any backend calls and Internet Identity dependency usage inside the new `AppV1.jsx` implementation (the app should function purely with in-file mock data + localStorage as per the provided code).
acceptanceCriteria: No calls to Motoko canister actors are introduced in `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx`.
All state is managed locally using React state and localStorage exactly as in the provided code.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be modified.
Do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx`; it must remain the thin wrapper that renders `AppV1`.
Ignore the backend for this change set (no Motoko/backend requirements, no canister API wiring).
User-facing text in this build request must be written in English (the injected app code’s UI strings remain as provided).
nonGoals: Do not implement or re-enable Internet Identity authentication flows for this version.
Do not add React Query data fetching or wire any canister actor methods.
Do not translate or rewrite the user-provided UI copy inside `AppV1.jsx` (keep it verbatim).
Do not redesign the UI or introduce additional screens/features beyond what exists in the provided code.
